src:
Bekuk Jepang, Rinov/Pitha ke Babak Kedua di Fuzhou China Terbuka 2019
05 Nov 2019, 13:33 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pasangan ganda campuran Indonesia, Rinov Rivaldy/Pitha Haningtyas Mentari sukses lolos ke babak kedua Fuzhou China Terbuka 2019 di Haixia Olympic Sports Center, Selasa (5/11/2019). Rinov/Pitha berhasil menahan laju pasangan asal Jepang, Yuki Kaneko/Misaki Matsutomo.
Rinov/Pitha mengakui kecolongan pada gim kedua, sehingga harus memastikan kemenangan lewat pertarungan tiga gim. Sempat unggul jauh 11-5, Rinov/Pitha terkejar. Meski begitu akhirnya mereka menang dengan skor 21-13, 16-21, 21-15.
“Kami sudah unggul jauh di gim kedua, lawan sudah siap dengan pengembalian kami dan malah kami yang tidak siap. Kami kecolongan di situ, dan langsung ketinggalan jauh. Ada kepikiran pernah unggul jauh dan terkejar lawan, nah tadi kepikiran seperti itu lagi,” kata Pitha usai laga via rilis PBSI.
text:
Beat Japan, Rinov / Pitha to the Second Round at Fuzhou 2019 China Open
05 Nov 2019, 13:33 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Indonesian mixed doubles pair Rinov Rivaldy / Pitha Haningtyas Mentari successfully qualified for the second round of the Fuzhou China Open 2019 at the Haixia Olympic Sports Center on Tuesday (11/05/2019). Rinov / Pitha managed to put a halt to the Japanese couple, Yuki Kaneko / Misaki Matsutomo.
Rinov / Pitha admitted cheating on the second game, so they had to ensure victory through a three-game battle. Had superior far 11-5, Rinov / Pitha overtaken. Even so they finally won with a score of 21-13, 16-21, 21-15.
"We are already far superior in the second game, our opponents are ready with our returns and instead we are not ready. We missed it there, and immediately left far behind. "There was a thought that I was far superior and overtaken by an opponent, now I thought of that again," said Pitha after the match via the PBSI release.
